pullRequest.body:
---
As per #7987 make statement of `neg_mem_ball_zero` an iff statement.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7723955526/job/21055090852)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7723955526/job/21055089872)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7723955526/job/21055090133)

```suggestion
theorem neg_mem_ball_zero_iff (r : ℝ) {x : E} : x ∈ ball p 0 r ↔ -x ∈ ball p 0 r := by
```

The "more complicated" expression should be on the left. Also, if we don't have an "implication" lemma, then we often omit `_iff` in the name.
```suggestion
theorem neg_mem_ball_zero {r : ℝ} {x : E} : -x ∈ ball p 0 r ↔ x ∈ ball p 0 r := by
  simp only [mem_ball_zero, map_neg_eq_map]
#align seminorm.symmetric_ball_zero Seminorm.neg_mem_ball_zero
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore(Analysis/Seminorm): make statement of `neg_mem_ball_zero` iff
